name: Black Water (itch) (makegamergirls)
description:
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ You've heard the stories, you've done the research.
There's treasure in that ship.  ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Black Water is a point-and-click horror game about searching for treasure in the depths of the ocean. Controls: Mouse and Left-Click F11 to toggle Fullscreen ESC to Quit Best played in a dark room while using headphones ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Code: Reed McCallum & Idean Behforouz Sound Design: Emma Powers Visuals: Lila Boehnke & Ryan Smith ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Made during SCREAM JAM 2020

ADDITIONAL SOUND CREDITS

"Underwater / Breathing" by ryanconway of Freesound.org
